Bleed.name: Bleed
Bleed.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target begins Bleeding (1 True damage at the start of their turn).

Body Block.name: Body Block
Body Block.description:
Trigger: You are targeted by an Attack.

Reaction: You reposition a creature Grappled by you to shield yourself from damage.

You and the Grappled creature take half the damage dealt by the attack and you can move the Grappled creature to any space adjacent to you immediately afterwards.

 

Grapple Maneuver:

While you have a creature Grappled, you can perform a Grapple Maneuver, you make an Athletics Check Contested by the target’s Martial Check.

A willing creature can choose to fail the Contest, taking a result of 0 instead.

Contest Success: The target is subjected to the Maneuver’s damage or effect.

Contest Failure: The target suffers no additional effects but remains Grappled by you.

Chained Style.name: Chained Style
Chained Style.description: Your Attacks ignore Shields and 1/2 Cover, and you deal +1 damage against targets that are wielding a Shield or behind 1/2 Cover.

Crossbow Style.name: Crossbow Style
Crossbow Style.description: You deal +1 damage against the last creature you Attacked with the Weapon since the start of your last turn.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target becomes Dazed (DisADV on Mental Checks) on the next Mental Check it makes before the end of your next turn.

Expose.name: Expose
Expose.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target becomes Exposed (Attack Checks against it have ADV) against the next Attack Check made against it before the end of your next turn.

Extend Attack.name: Extend Attack
Extend Attack.description: Your Melee Attack Range is increased by 1 Space (or your Ranged Attack Range is increased by 5 Spaces) for the Attack Check.

Forbearance.name: Forbearance
Forbearance.description:
Trigger: Creature you can see within 1 Space is targeted by an Attack that targets its PD.

Reaction: You can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to become the new target of the Check, and choose to switch places with the original target (if it's willing).

If the Check is accompanied by a Save (as with a Dynamic Attack Save), you make the Save instead of the original target.

Technique Enhancements

  • Steadfast Forbearance: (1 SP) If multiple creatures within 1 Space of you (after switching places if you choose to do so) and are targeted by the same Check, you can attempt to protect them as well. You can spend 1 SP per additional target to become the new target of its Check as well. You take the collective damage of all protected creatures against the Check.
  • Immense Defense: (2 SP) You gain Resistance against all damage taken using this Technique.

Hamstring.name: Hamstring
Hamstring.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail:  The target is Slowed 1 (Every 1 Space you move costs an extra 1 Space of movement) until the end of your next turn.

Heroic Bash.name: Heroic Bash
Heroic Bash.description:
Using a Melee Weapon or Unarmed Strike you can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to attempt to send an enemy hurling through the air.

Make an Attack Check against the PD of a target within 1 Space of you, and it makes a Physical Save.

Attack Hit: It takes your Weapons damage.

Save Failure: It gets knockback horizontally up to 3 Spaces + 1 additional Space for every 5 they fail the Save by.

  • Airborne: You can choose to knock the enemy vertically into the air. When you do, they move half the total distance and may be subjected to fall damage.
  • Knock Prone: After the result, you can choose to reduce the total distance the target is pushed by 1 Space to knock them Prone instead.

Technique Enhancements

  • Extended Knockback: (1 SP) Increase the Knockback distance by 2 Spaces and increase the damage by 1.
  • Painful Knockback: (1 SP) Increase the damage by 2.
  • Bash & Smash: (1 SP, 1 AP) Change the Target from one creature to every creature within 1 Space.

Heroic Leap.name: Heroic Leap
Heroic Leap.description:
Using a Melee Weapon or Unarmed Strike, you can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to perform an exceptional leap and assault a creature.

You gain up to your Speed in Spaces and increase your Jump Distance by 1 on the next Long or Vertical Jump you make.

You leap into the air and make an Attack Check against a target in range, and the target makes a Physical Save.

Attack Hit: It takes your Weapons damage.

Save Failure: The target falls Prone.

Technique Enhancements

  • Brutal Leap: (1 SP) Transfer all of the Falling damage you would usually take into the target instead (see “Falling Attacks” for more information).  
  • Heroic Slam: (1 SP, 1 AP) Compare your Attack Check against the PD of all creatures within 1 Space of you (instead of a single target).
  • Far Leap: (1 SP) Increase your damage by 1 and your Jump Distance by 2.

Heroic Parry.name: Heroic Parry
Heroic Parry.description:
Requires: Melee Weapon

Trigger: You or a creature you can see within 1 Space are targeted by an Attack that targets its PD. 

Reaction: You can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to grant the target a +5 bonus to its PD until the start of its next turn. 

Technique Enhancements

  • Heroic Disengage: (1 SP) Allow the target to Disengage after the attack, and move up to half its Speed.

Heroic Taunt.name: Heroic Taunt
Heroic Taunt.description:
You can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to attempt to Taunt all enemies within 5 Spaces.

Make an Attack Check, Influence Check or Intimidation Check (your choice) contested by each target’s Mental Save.

Contest Success: Each creature you beat is Taunted (DisADV on Attack and Spell Checks against creatures other than you) by you until the end of your next turn.

 

Technique Enhancements

  • Legendary Taunt: (2 SP) Any damage dealt by Taunted enemies is halved against any creatures other than you.

System Tip: By default this item is configured to use Attack Check. You need to edit "Roll" Tab to change it to Intimidation Check.

Hinder.name: Hinder
Hinder.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target becomes Hindered (it has DisADV on Attack Checks) on the next Attack Check it makes before the end of your next turn.

Impair.name: Impair
Impair.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target becomes Impaired (DisADV on Physical Checks) on the next Physical Check it makes before the end of your next turn.

Knockback.name: Knockback
Knockback.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target is pushed 1 Space away + 1 additional Space for every 5 it fails its Save by.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description:
Trigger: When a creature you can see within 1 Space (including yourself) is targeted by an Attack against its PD.

Reaction: You grant the target a +5 bonus to PD against this Attack.

Power Attack.name: Power Attack
Power Attack.description: You deal +1 damage with the Attack. You can use this Maneuver multiple times.

Protect.name: Protect
Protect.description:
Trigger: A creature you can see within 1 Space is Hit by an Attack against its PD.

Reaction: The target takes half of the damage and you take the other half. The damage you take bypasses any Damage Reduction.

Raise Shield.name: Raise Shield
Raise Shield.description:
Requires: You are wielding a Shield.

Trigger: When a creature you can see within 1 Space (including yourself) is targeted by an Attack against its PD.

Reaction (Maneuver): (1 AP) You reduce the damage against the target by an amount equal to your Shield’s PD bonus.

Restrain.name: Restrain
Restrain.description:
The target is Restrained until the Grapple ends. On its turn, it can spend 1 AP to break being Restrained, but remains Grappled until the Condition ends.

 

Grapple Maneuver:

While you have a creature Grappled, you can perform a Grapple Maneuver, you make an Athletics Check Contested by the target’s Martial Check.

A willing creature can choose to fail the Contest, taking a result of 0 instead.

Contest Success: The target is subjected to the Maneuver’s damage or effect.

Contest Failure: The target suffers no additional effects but remains Grappled by you.

Side Step.name: Side Step
Side Step.description:
Trigger: You are targeted by an Attack against your PD.

Reaction: You move 1 Space to a Space that’s still within the Attack’s range. When you do, the Attack has DisADV against you. If you move behind Cover, you do not gain the benefit of that Cover against the Attack.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description:
The target takes 1 Bludgeoning damage.

Success (each 5): +1 damage.

 

Grapple Maneuver:

While you have a creature Grappled, you can perform a Grapple Maneuver, you make an Athletics Check Contested by the target’s Martial Check.

A willing creature can choose to fail the Contest, taking a result of 0 instead.

Contest Success: The target is subjected to the Maneuver’s damage or effect.

Contest Failure: The target suffers no additional effects but remains Grappled by you.

Slip Away.name: Slip Away
Slip Away.description:
Trigger: A Creature misses you with an Attack Check

Reaction: You can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to take the Full Dodge Action, and can move up to your Speed.

Technique Enhancements

  • Diving Attack: (1 SP) Make an Attack Check against a creature within 1 Space of you as part of Slip Away (you make this attack before the creature makes theirs).

Spear Style.name: Spear Style
Spear Style.description: You deal +1 damage against a creature if you moved 2 Spaces towards it immediately before making the Attack or if it is on a Mount.

Sunder Armor.name: Sunder Armor
Sunder Armor.description:
You can spend 1 AP and 1 SP to make an Attack Check against a creature with Damage Reduction (DR).

You deal additional damage equal to the target’s PDR value. This damage ignores the target’s PDR.

Technique Enhancements

  • Armor Shred: (1 SP) Further increase the damage done by an amount equal to the target's PDR.
  • Broken Armor: (1 SP) Reduce the PD of the target by 2 for the rest of the Combat. A creature can’t be affected by this again until the effect ends.

Swap.name: Swap
Swap.description:
You switch Spaces with a willing creature within 1 Space.

If this movement would provoke an Opportunity Attack against you or the target creature, any Opportunity Attacks are made against you.

Sweep Attack.name: Sweep Attack
Sweep Attack.description:
Choose 1 additional target within 1 Space of the original target that’s within your Attack Range.

Make 1 Attack Check against all targets.

Attack Hit: The original target takes your Weapon (or Unarmed Strike) damage, and each additional target Hit takes 1 damage of the same type.

Takedown.name: Takedown
Takedown.description:
The target falls Prone. You don’t fall Prone unless you choose to do so.

 

Grapple Maneuver:

While you have a creature Grappled, you can perform a Grapple Maneuver, you make an Athletics Check Contested by the target’s Martial Check.

A willing creature can choose to fail the Contest, taking a result of 0 instead.

Contest Success: The target is subjected to the Maneuver’s damage or effect.

Contest Failure: The target suffers no additional effects but remains Grappled by you.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description:
Choose a creature that can see or hear you within 5 Spaces. Make an Attack Check, Influence Check or Intimidation Check (your choice) contested by the target’s Mental Save.

Contest Success: The target is Taunted (DisADV on Attack and Spell Checks against creatures other than you) by you on their next Attack or Spell Check.

Full Taunt: You can spend an additional 1 AP to have the Taunted Condition last until the end of your next turn.

System Tip: By default this item is configured to use Attack Check. You need to edit "Roll" Tab to change it to Intimidation Check.

Throw.name: Throw
Throw.description:
Requires: The Grappled creature is your size or smaller.

The target is thrown up to a number of Spaces equal to your 1/2 of your Might (ending the Grappled Condition) + up to 1 additional Space for every 5 they fail the Contest by (see “Throwing Creatures” for more information).

 

Grapple Maneuver:

While you have a creature Grappled, you can perform a Grapple Maneuver, you make an Athletics Check Contested by the target’s Martial Check.

A willing creature can choose to fail the Contest, taking a result of 0 instead.

Contest Success: The target is subjected to the Maneuver’s damage or effect.

Contest Failure: The target suffers no additional effects but remains Grappled by you.

Trip.name: Trip
Trip.description:
Save Enhancement: Target makes Physical Save against the chosen effect. If you spend AP on multiple effects, the enemy creature will only make 1 Save against all effects.

Save Fail: The target falls Prone.

Tumble and Dive.name: Tumble and Dive
Tumble and Dive.description:
Trigger: You are the target of an Attack.

Reaction: You can spend 2 AP and 1 SP to move up to your Speed and avoid the attack entirely as long as you end your movement outside of the range or behind Full Cover of the Attack. This movement provokes Opportunity Attacks as normal.

Technique Enhancements

  • Heroic Dive: (2 SP) You can bring 1 additional willing creature along with you as part of Tumble and Dive. They move the same amount of Spaces as you and must also end their movement within 1 Space of you.

Volley.name: Volley
Volley.description:
Using a Ranged Weapon, you can spend 2 AP and 1 SP to launch a volley of projectiles.

Choose a point within your Weapon’s range. Make a single Attack Check and compare it against the PD of all creatures of your choice within 1 Space of the chosen point.

Attack Hit: You deal 2 Piercing damage to each creature.

Technique Enhancements

  • Impairing Volley: (1 SP) Force each creature within the area to make a Physical Save.
    Failure: They are Impaired (DisADV on Physical Checks) until the end of your next turn.

  • Blanket of Arrows: (1 SP) Increase the area to 3 Spaces from the chosen point.
  • Line of Arrows: (1 SP) Target any creature occupying a space in a line from you to the chosen point, within your weapon’s range.

Whip Style.name: Whip Style
Whip Style.description: You deal +1 damage when target is farther than 1 Space from you.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description:
Using a Melee Weapon (or Unarmed Strike), you can spend 2 AP and 1 SP to make a single Attack Check against the PD of all creatures of your choice within 1 Space of you.

Attack Hit: You deal your Weapon (or Unarmed Strike) damage to each creature.

Technique Enhancements

  • Blood Whirl: (1 SP) Force each creature within range to make a Physical Save.
    Failure: They begin Bleeding (1 True damage at the start of their turn until DC 10 Medicine Check).

  • Wide Swings: (1 SP) Increase the range by 1 Space
  • Throwing Finisher: (1 SP) If you are wielding a Melee Weapon, you can choose to spend an extra 1 SP at the end of the Whirlwind to throw the Weapon at a target within 5 Spaces. Use the same single Attack Check against this target as well. The weapon lands within 1 Space of the target (GM Discretion).
